content.title: Project Update: Thank You for Your Trust & Support!
content.creator:
Sam&Johnny
March 14, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,

We sincerely apologize for the temporary pause in our campaign.The issue stemmed from a trademark overlap in our KICKSTARTER project title.Weâ€™ve taken immediate action to revise our language and ensure full compliance.

Please rest assured: Our Sam&Johnny HB17 - Soft Sleep & Instant Translating Earphones are 100% original, backed by patents, and fully ready to go. With two successful Kickstarter projects delivered on time, we remain committed to transparency, quality, and delivering on our promises.

Thank you for standing by us. We value your trust and are confident this project will be another success!

Best regards,

The Sam&Johnny Team
